/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of being in the midst of the action. The street is lined with trees and buildings, creating a canopy of greenery and architecture. Cars and motorcycles are parked along the sides of the street, indicating a busy time of day. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting shadows and highlighting the colors of the scene.
